Package: org.weceem.content

[Groovy] Class WcmContent

    • org.weceem.content.WcmContent
    • All Implemented Interfaces and Traits:
      java.lang.Comparable, Taggable, java.io.Serializable

      class WcmContent

      WcmContent class describes the content information.

      Authors:
      Stephan Albers
      July Karpey
      Sergei Shushkevich
      Marc Palmer

          Can be overriden by content types to customize the long title used for rendering HTML SEO-friendly page titles

          Can be overriden by content types to customize the short title used for rendering menu items etc

        • boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)

        • java.lang.Object escapeToXML(java.lang.Object s)

        • java.lang.String getAbsoluteURI()

        • java.lang.String getContentAsHTML()

          Should be overriden by content types that can represent their content as HTML. Used for wcm:content tag (content rendering)

        • java.lang.String getContentAsText()

          Must be overriden by content types that can represent their content as text. Used for search results and versioning

        • java.lang.String getHardDependencies()

          Return list of content dependency URIs comma-delimited, that must always apply to this node based on its current state

        • java.util.Date getLastModified()

        • java.util.List getLineage()

        • java.lang.String getMimeType()

        • java.lang.String getTitleForHTML()

          Can be overriden by content types to customize the long title used for rendering HTML SEO-friendly page titles

        • java.lang.String getTitleForMenu()

          Can be overriden by content types to customize the short title used for rendering menu items etc

        • java.util.Map getVersioningProperties()

          Descendents must override and call super and add their own properties

        • int hashCode()

        • void saveRevision(java.lang.Object latestTitle, java.lang.Object latestSpaceName)

          Save a new content revision object with the current state of this content node
